concept.title: AMF support for release 16 LI standards update (Feature f20301-01)
concept.shortdesc: This feature introduces the support for release 16 lawful interception standards for the AMF and the support for HTTP2 on the L1_X2 links.

conbody.p: With this feature, the IMEISV is accepted as a new target type. Also, the format of the matched target identifiers is changed with release 16 compared with release 15 on the X2 interface.
The HTTP2 is only supported with the AMF LI configuration, but not with the IEF functionality.
